self.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the type of person you are, your character, your typical behaviour etc
self.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Sid was not his usual smiling self.
Jim was beginning to feel like his old self again.
Peter was the only one to whom she showed her true self.
self.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a word written in business letters, on cheques etc meaning yourself
self.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: used to refer to a person
self.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: a picture of a journalist and your good self (=you)
self.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: When she came home at Christmas she seemed very quiet and not her normal self.
He sounded more like his old self than the last time she had called.
At last he had revealed his true self.
Over the years she had put up barriers to protect her inner self.
self.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: of, to, with, or for yourself or itself
